front.title: Signaling Root-Initiated Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowires using LDP

abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism to signal Point-to-Multipoint(P2MP) Pseudowires (PW) tree using LDP. Such a mechanism is suitablefor any Layer 2 VPN service requiring P2MP connectivity over an IP orMPLS-enabled PSN. A P2MP PW established via the proposed mechanism isroot initiated.
